god awful game, 4 man squads shouldnt be able to kick a solo. sometimes i just want to get a quick game in, and it's unfair as fuck when i carry my team and they end up kicking me because it's "funny". games had literal generations to fix gameplay issues but wants to be a siege ripoff with their "operators" and their whole "seasons" thing is an obvious cash grab
